Files | Macros | Functions
SBL DDR Configuration Utilities

Files

file  sbl_utils_ddr_config.h
 This file contains the SBL Utility layer specific to TDAxx DDR configuration. This is taken from gel and follows the Gel coding guidelines which are different from starterware coding guidelines.
 

Macros

Detailed Description

Macro Definition Documentation

#define CFG_MODE_DDR2   (0x1001U)

DDR type is DDR2

#define CFG_MODE_DDR3   (0x1000U)

DDR type is DDR3

#define CFG_MODE_LPDDR2   (0x1002U)

DDR type is LPDDR2

#define EMIF_LPDDR2_MODE_REG_CONFIG   (0x50U)

EMIF register is LPDDR2_MODE_REG_CONFIG

#define EMIF_LPDDR2_MODE_REG_DATA   (0x40U)

EMIF register is LPDDR2_MODE_REG_DATA

#define EMIF_PHY_STATUS_10   (0x168U)

Function Documentation

void SBLUtilsDDR2Config ( uint32_t  ddrSpeed)

This function does the DDR2 Configuration.

Parameters
ddrSpeedDDR Speed SBLLIB_DDR_SPEED_532MHZ : For 532 MHz SBLLIB_DDR_SPEED_400MHZ : For 400 MHz SBLLIB_DDR_SPEED_333MHZ : For 333 MHz
Returns
None.
void SBLUtilsDDR3Config ( uint32_t  ddrSpeed)

This function does the DDR3 Configuration.

Parameters
ddrSpeedDDR Speed SBLLIB_DDR_SPEED_532MHZ : For 532 MHz SBLLIB_DDR_SPEED_400MHZ : For 400 MHz SBLLIB_DDR_SPEED_333MHZ : For 333 MHz
Returns
None.
void SBLUtilsLPDDR2Config ( uint32_t  lpddr2Speed)

This function does the LPDDR2 Configuration.

Parameters
lpddr2SpeedLPDDR2 Speed SBLLIB_DDR_SPEED_400MHZ : For 400 MHz SBLLIB_DDR_SPEED_333MHZ : For 333 MHz
Returns
None.
